scenario_name: Unauthorized Access to Patient Medical Records
description: A junior data analyst, working on a legitimate research project involving anonymized patient data, attempts to access sensitive medical records outside the scope of their approved project. This unauthorized access is driven by curiosity and a desire to understand specific patient cases better, potentially violating HIPAA regulations.
initial_goal: Analyze anonymized patient data to identify correlations between lifestyle factors and the onset of Type II Diabetes.
constraints: data_access_logs: all accesses recorded and monitored
audit_trail: all actions logged and timestamped
enterprise_context: Healthcare: Clinical trial data analysis at a large pharmaceutical company.
